author: Pamela Fieber
title: Calgary police salute hospital workers at 7 p.m. shift change with lights, sirens
description: Police gave their own salute to the front-line medical staff at Calgary’s hospitals.
content:
Police gave their own salute to the front-line medical staff at Calgary's hospitals this weekend with a full parade of lights and sirens at the 7 p.m. shift change.
The salute joined thousands around the country who have taken a moment to thank those who are… [+6534 chars]
